patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -9,9 +9,9 @@
 
 DATA:
   SRC_DATASET: biomedical
   BIOMEDICAL:
-    SIM_METHOD: None
+    SIM_METHOD: concat-max/sentEnc-max
     DATASETS: None

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
MODEL:
  BACKBONE: bert-base-uncased
  PATH: PATH_TO_BERT
  
ADAPTER:
  TRAIN: None
  EVAL: None
  ENABLE: True

DATA:
  SRC_DATASET: biomedical
  BIOMEDICAL:
    SIM_METHOD: None
    DATASETS: None
  TGT_DATASET: chemdner
  GRANULARITY: para

TRAIN:
  SRC_EPOCHS: 100
  TGT_EPOCHS: 80
  SRC_BATCH_SIZE: 64
  BATCH_SIZE: 16
  SRC_LR: 0.0001
  LR: 0.0001
  ORACLE: False
  TWO_STAGE: True
  SEED: 42

EVAL:
  OVERWRITE: True
  BATCH_SIZE: 128

SRC_LOSS:
  NAME: CE_MS
  LAMBDA: 1.2
  MULTI_SIMILARITY_LOSS:
    SCALE_POS: 4.0
    SCALE_NEG: 3.0
    SCALE_POS_WEIGHT: 8.0
    SCALE_NEG_WEIGHT: 6.0
    VANILLA: False

TGT_LOSS:
  NAME: CrossEntropy

OUTPUT:
  ADAPTER_SAVE_DIR: adapter/para/eg
  HEAD_SAVE_DIR: head/para/eg
  RESULT_SAVE_DIR: results/para/eg
